mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member1(memberIdx, id, pwd, name, userLevel, nickName) VALUES (#{memberIdx}, #{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{userLevel}, #{nickName})
mapper.select: SELECT m1.memberIdx, m1.id, m1.pwd, m1.name, m1.userLevel, m1.nickName, m1.reg_date, m1.mod_date, m1.last_login, m2.email1, m2.email2, m2.tel1, m2.tel2, m2.tel3 FROM member1 m1 LEFT OUTER JOIN member2 m2 ON m1.memberIdx = m2.memberIdx WHERE m1.id = #{id}
SELECT authority FROM memberAuthority ma JOIN member1 m ON ma.memberIdx = m.memberIdx WHERE m.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE member1 SET last_login = SYSDATE WHERE id = #{id}
